website_summaries.verdict: Not too thick and not too thin, this option strikes an excellent balance of breathability and coziness. Ideal for year round use.
pros: Constructed of 100% cotton fabric and breathable microfiber fill
Earns praise for its softness and comfort
Multiple colors and patterns to choose from
cons: Set only includes a comforter and 2 pillowcases

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly pleased
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous before it arrived. Was pleasantly pleased when I got it! The material is super comfy and its not too thick and not too thin either! Fits easily into my top loading washer too. Love the stripes and the color its classy and simple! I need to get fluffier pillows to fill the shams better its a little baggy with the pillows pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Smith

customer_reviews.title: Really cute and great value! Cat-approved, too!
customer_reviews.text: The bedding came shrink-wrapped, but I just threw it into my dryer on the steam cycle to fluff it up and remove the wrinkles. I ordered a King for our queen guest bed, and it fits very well. I think a queen would have been too small. The fabric is surprisingly soft. The pillow shams have an envelope closure. I used extra firm (big) pillows to fill out the shams. The cat loves her new bedding - she’s been sprawled out on it since i made the bed up.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyDB

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Airy, Warm!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this comforter! It arrived yesterday afternoon so we let it expand for about 15 minutes after opening the packaging and then through it in the washer/dryer! Needless to say, this comforter is the perfect ratio of airy/light and fluffy! It's not bulky, yet it is still warm (not hot though). The material is incredibly soft but not fuzzy. Very, very comfortable! I did not want to get out of bed this morning! I highly recommend this blanket!
customer_reviews.author: Amber A.

customer_reviews.title: I loved it, until I didn't.
customer_reviews.text: I really, really liked this until I had to wash it. The cute stripes, the light feel, etc. LOVED it. But then... I HAD to wash it because my skin broke out in a rash from sleeping on it the first night. Okay, I have sensitive skin. Fine. But then I washed it, and the fabric of the pillow cases is CRAZY wrinkled now, and the comforter straight up shrunk. It was a king size, and now it barely fits on my queen size guest bed. I've never even heard of such a thing happening. I had no idea comforters could shrink. So... Not real thrilled with it. What good is a comforter you can't wash?
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lovett

customer_reviews.title: Lovely comforter, but now doesn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: Originally we loved the comforter. It was very comfy. Nice and soft. And kept us warm at night. After about a month’s use we washed and dried it (following the instructions on the package, tumble dry low) and when we placed it back on the back it doesn’t fully hang off the sides of the bed anymore. It barely reaches the bottom of our frame on the front, but no longer on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B!

customer_reviews.title: Just the colour combo that I needed
customer_reviews.text: I'd been looking for a comforter with a grey and white colour combo for a while so I was happy when I found this one. It was just what I was looking for, came tightly packaged and fluffed right up when I took it out of its bag. It's not a heavy comforter but it was just right for my needs
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter. It’s so cute and neutral so you can do different color schemes with some throw pillows and sheets. I like the simple look and it is not too thick but not too thin. It seems like very good quality. I sized up and got a king for my queen bed, and I would recommend this if your husband also likes to steal the covers. I think the price is reasonable and it isn’t a duvet so you don’t have to worry about the down comforter staying in place. The price would be about the same if I bought a duvet and an insert for it. I definitely would recommend this bedding set.
customer_reviews.author: Emilee Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Just DON’T!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am usually happy with my Amazon purchases and always investigate reviews before I buy, but this has by far been one of the worst purchases I have made! There’s really not much to say about this comforter other than that it is complete JUNK. I ordered a King and it still is too small for my Queen bed. And read the fine print as I must have missed it. It’s 100% Polyester. You’ll get a better deal at Walmart. This is maybe a $15-20 comforter AT BEST. Definitely NOT worth the price you pay and not soft or cute at all to make it worth it.
customer_reviews.author: ambuler8297

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: $64 for what? Looked beautiful UNTIL YOU WASH IT. Fiber fill just bunches up. Where there is stitching, it shrinks and binds. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa G

customer_reviews.title: Great product quality for price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter! I was a little concerned bc the price was low and the first thing I do It throw my comforter In the washer when I buy new! It’s got a good feel! Not silky soft or not hard just really perfect in my opinion! The weight is that also! I bought another much more expensive comforter and It was so thick I felt like I was drowning in the bed and then Didn’t hold up well!! NOT the case here this thing is perfect! It will be great weight for summer and winter!! Plus it’s beautiful! Perfect farmhouse look for fraction of price of other comforters I priced!
customer_reviews.author: MomChaosCoordinator

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. We have a King bed, and I ordered a king. It barely reaches the edges of the mattress and looks ridiculous. Lightweight for sure, too lightweight. Waste of money.... and I even recommended to my friend who bought the same one I did!! She said the same; too small and too lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Ripped in less than 2 weeks!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give a worse review I would. Cheap material. Hardly fits my entire king bed and it's supposed to be "over sized" and we have used it for less than 2 weeks and it ripped!!! Definately a rip off and waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Clean, basic, good value and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great set, very impressed with this product especially for the price. Tired of all these amazon sellers selling bunk products and marketing their items as “100% egyptian cotton” or “100000000 thread count” only to see the fine print and find out its something else. This product is simple, straight to the point, and exactly what it says it is. Great job Seller, for NOT inflating your products. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We are loving this comforter
customer_reviews.text: I rarely leave reviews, but felt I had to for this comforter. It is absolutely beautiful! Super soft. It's heavy enough that it stays in place while we sleep, but not so heavy that it makes us warm. The gray stripes are a little darker (to me) than they seem in the pictures, but I actually like it better. After reading other reivews, I decided to go up a size - we have a Queen bed, but I ordered a King comforter) and it is perfect! Love this! We will be buying more of this brand for our guest rooms in the next year.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Wake in a Throw Blanket
customer_reviews.text: The name alone is inaccurate. There’s no “cloud” about it. It barely has any cushion to it. It’s maybe 1” thick. I was expecting a “cloud” feel to it as described. It’s anything but. It’s compatible with a throw blanket. Not worth the money, that’s for sure.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I should have known better.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely Poor quality! Came with a stain on it pretty much close to other reviews I’ve seen. You will probably have to take to dry cleaners. I had to steam it to get the wrinkles out. What really brought me to write this review did not last more two months. Ripped!! So unhappy!
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: It just has one flaw......Otherwise it is OK
customer_reviews.text: I would love the quilt but there is minimal stitching to keep everything in place and it tends to make it pucker.......If I hadn’t already used it I would definitely exchange for a more expensive one with better stitching🥴
customer_reviews.author: Patye AZ

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing and cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this comforter. But it's been disappointment all around. Its listed as a full/queen size, but it barely covers our queen bed and it's rather short. It is lightweight but the batting is polyester and extremely hot. The stripes are wider than the picture and the fabric feels cheap.
customer_reviews.author: EthansMom

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I was genuinely surprised at how quickly this arrived and how small of a package it was! I washed it once I got it and did have some issues with wrinkles, but I'm not terribly fussy about it. I ordered a King size for my queen size bed just to make sure that I can wrap up in it like a burrito. It's incredibly warm and comfortable, especially now that it's getting cold outside. My cat is happy with it, too! I really don't have any complaints. It looks great, arrived in perfect condition, and it's really comfortable. I'd recommend it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Cook

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the color and stripe thickness
customer_reviews.text: The stripes on the comforter are MUCH wider than what was shown in the picture. The picture also looked like the stripes were blueish gray but in person they are almost purplish. My husband is hot blooded. The comforter is a perfect thickness for him. The comforter was vacuum packed so of course was extremely wrinkled when it was opened.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna J Salonen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.  Nice fabric.
customer_reviews.text: Great comforter for those who like a comforter that is not too heavy. This one is just right. The fabric is good quality and is pretty soft, but will get softer with age. The only reason I give it only 4 stars is there were a few threads that did not get cut off. The stitching was nice and tight, it's just the end thread did not get cut. Otherwise it seems to be very well made.
customer_reviews.author: KimberOKC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, crunchy feeling and so wrinkled, returning!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to order this product, but very disappointed when I got it! This comforter was crunchy Feeling and was so wrinkly! It was also not long enough for my king sized bed, and I bought a king size. Returning!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Washed up nicely
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is soft after washing, weight seems to be a good all season weight in Colorado..can add a blanket in Winter and it's light enough for Summer. There was a plastic smell when I opened it, it still lingered after I washed it. It went away after 2 days and it's fine now..I have a crazy sensitive nose and it doesn't bother me. Nice quality comforter
customer_reviews.author: Jace

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We got the queen size and really love the look! It is really soft and lightweight - perfect for summer (or winter if the room gets hot)! I was expecting it to be a little fluffier, but still a really nice comforter. The pillow cases are soft and good if you want to use it to sleep on or just for decor. Consider buying a size up if you want to have more of an oversized look!
customer_reviews.author: jsblair5683

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the BEST comforter I've ever bought. It comes vaccum packed but expands nicely. Excellent quality for the price. It's the perfect weight and super fluffy. Keeps you warm but not too hot. The only downside (which to me isn't even worth losing a star over) is that it wrinkles quite a bit after washing. I washed it at home. It may do better in a commercial washer or of course dry cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Dirt stain on pillowcase. Wrinkles after wash
customer_reviews.text: The reason I got the comforter set is because it's 100% cotton but it's a rougher cotton than our other set we bought from Target that is Supima. The pillowcase came with a dirt mark, and I washed it but it's still there. How does a dirt mark get on there when it's completely sealed and suctioned? After being washed and dried, it gets very wrinkled so that's a downside. I have to steam out the wrinkles as much as I could. Comforter is lightweight and it gets the job done. I've bought a duvet set from this company before and liked it so that's why I ordered from them again.
customer_reviews.author: EllK23

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and comfortable comforter
customer_reviews.text: Such a comfortable and cozy comforter. I paired it with a down comforter and some cute fall pillows for a modern farmhouse feel. It really does feel like a cloud. My last comforter was not cotton and you can certainly tell the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Cute pattern and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall l like this comforter a lot, I ordered a king and it seems to be a little short but I don’t mind it not touching the floor when I make the bed. It’s pretty soft and lightweight but still keeps your warm at night.
customer_reviews.author: Emriddle

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this comforter. We live in Florida so it is very hot. We keep our air in the low 70’a at night. This is very soft and lightweight yet able to keep you warm. I actually purchased another comforter that is solid and use this at the foot of the bed. Very stylish and then converts to a great cover to sleep with.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy does well with wash no problems
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I purchased this my daughter will not go back into sleeping in her own bed she loves this big comfy blanket I’m going to have to purchase her own I will say you do sleep kinda hot with this does keep you nice and warm I washed mine before use an it held up great I would recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Grant

customer_reviews.title: Awesome find
customer_reviews.text: I live in the deep south and it is blazing hot! I needed a light comforter for the summer. This comforter is not only light weight, but it is super soft. I was hesitant at first because a lot of the reviews were saying the size wasn't true. I ordered the queen for my queen bed and I feel it is perfect! The only thing i would have liked was for the stripes to maybe not be as dark. Other than that, i love it!! Would definitely buy another one like this!
customer_reviews.author: Maxine McGovern

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Bought a king size. And it would probably be better for a full size. It does run really small.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful comforter.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. True to size listed.. Wash it upon opening because it's vacuum sealed and pretty wrinkled. But love how it brightens up my monochromatic bedroom. Wouldn't hesitate to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason F.

customer_reviews.title: King size fit almost perfect for our king bed
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when I purchased this after reading some reviews of the sizes being too small. I have a king size so ordered a king size, since there was no option to size up to a cal king. This comforter fit our king size almost perfectly! The only complaint I have is on the length of the comforter, it’s about 6” short for our bed but it’s really not a big deal since I was more worried about the width, which was perfect, it hangs perfectly over the sides of the bed. Overall very nice comforter, definitely keeps me warm.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter..it’s a great color scheme and so comfy! I bought a king size for my queen bed because I wanted it to hang low on the sides and it does! It’s not as fluffy as I hoped but I’m sure a toss in the dryer will help it along. I would definitely recommend this comforter!
customer_reviews.author: jg4au

customer_reviews.title: Best comforters I’ve bought in 15 years!
customer_reviews.text: I love these comforters! The cotton feels so soft and natural. It’s fluffy and warm but lightweight enough to layer. It’s just one of those comforters everyone in the house tries to claim as their own, good thing I got one for each of my children. I love them so much I’m ordering one for my and my husband’s bed.
customer_reviews.author: Shana G.

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it so badly...
customer_reviews.text: Update...so after having this on our bed for a while, we’re over it. I wanted to love it because it’s so cute and comfy, but the sizing is just so off. We have a standard size queen mattress and it’s got maybe 2” of slack around the entire thing. Original...Color is amazing and its super comfy! Could be a little bit longer and wider, but that's it!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this comforter for my king size bed. There were options that were cheaper on Amazon, but I felt like this one would be better quality. I feel like I was sent a defective comforter, as it was not the size described. The comforter barely covers my king size bed all the way, it appears to be a queen size comforter. I am also not pleased with the roughness of the material of the comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Guess

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my  Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping. Very very happy with my purchase. I was nervous on how soft it would be but it exceeded my expectations. The pattern is beautiful I am so pleased! Thank you. I will purchase from seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy Jenny

customer_reviews.title: A very good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I just love this comforter. Just perfect for our travel trailer queen bed. Very comfy and fits bed well. Very happy with this purchase. Came in air tight packaging, but did take a bit longer to ship.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all!
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, this isn't a super high quality comforter but let me tell you this product was definitely not cheaply made either. The fabric was just as soft, yet durable as your favorite pair of pants. I got the TWIN SIZED comforter and it fit perfectly. It's not too thick, but certainly not too thin either. IT's perfect if you want something nice but don't want to spend $100 for something that may or may not be your taste.
customer_reviews.author: zakstourkid

customer_reviews.title: More blueish gray
customer_reviews.text: It’s basically what I expected but the some recon ace it seem pretty great! It was as expected nothing too special I’m probably going to return the gray stripes are more on the blue gray side :/
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Buy separate pillowcases.
customer_reviews.text: Other than the pillowcases being a little starchier than I care for, even after being washed & dried, this comforter is wonderful. It's foggy and super warm without being heat exhausting inducing. 9/10 cause again...pillowcases.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love the striped comforter, but after washing, the fiber filling bunched up and shrunk. I have a queen size bed and it doesn't seem to quite fit like a queen comforter should. Disappointed and not worth the $70 bucks that I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: erin hill

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy warm
customer_reviews.text: It barely fits in a home washing machine. Otherwise... Warm. Fluffy. Soft. Comfy... I use it as a blanket and to lay on. Warm but not heavy. Nice to lay on when warmer nights occur. And if you are like me & eat in bed, messy me, it washes up great.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna

customer_reviews.title: Great but too short after washing.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set, but only gave 4 stars because like previous posters said, once washed and dried on low, it is just a little short on both sides. It could use at least another foot all around.
customer_reviews.author: Home Made Possible

customer_reviews.title: very soft beautiful cotton
customer_reviews.text: really pleased with this comforter. I returned several others, this one is great quality, worth the price. it comes with pillowcases, not shams
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: Fragile comforter seams
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this comforter back in July. I opened and washed it last night for the first time. The seems tore and the comforter is virtually useless now. Beware- if you purchase this item wash it immediately. Unfortunately it’s not worth my time or money to try to return it. That’s why I buy online. Amazon will not issue replacements. It’s really cute so that’s unfortunate. It now will look great in my garbage can. Pay attention to the return policy before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Cortny kooser

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed the lofty feel of a comforter but the coolness/lightness for summer weather. It's absolutely soft and perfect!! It's fluffy and lofty, soft fabric, and very light. It's light and thin enough to go straight into the wash. LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The product definitely does not look like the picture. The comforter is pretty thin, not very fluffy, and the texture is kinda rough /itchy. I was not pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Arriola

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this comforter. For the price, I do think the quality could be better. But it’s warm, lightweight, and exactly what we wanted. We also love that the filling is in place. We won’t have to take it out to wash it!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, color matches the photo. It’s very fluffy and soft. A bit difficult to remove wrinkles (I washed and dried and it didn’t help) but i like it a lot for my son’s new bed.
customer_reviews.author: Lanier

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS COMFORTER!!
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and just do it, buy this comforter. You will not regret it. It is the most cozy comforter I've ever owned. It does not feel too heavy but it's not light either. Basically it's perfect. And when I need a new one I will most definitely be purchasing another one of these!!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie B

customer_reviews.title: Warning
customer_reviews.text: You might not want to get out of bed. This comforter is extremely comfortable. We did fluff them a bit after taking it out of the vacuum seal packaging. The comforter is very breathable and warm. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Very snuggly
customer_reviews.text: I live in Florida and it is pretty comfortable and not to hot. I love how fluffy and comfy it is it's like sleeping in a cloud. I definitely recommend this when I get comforter. It's also very stylish. It looks good in my nautical themed room.
customer_reviews.author: Myriam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It’s everything I imagined it would be. It’s soft, simple, and lightweight. I purchased a set of ivory sheets to go with it and it goes perfectly with my farm house theme. This is the best comforter I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Coats

customer_reviews.title: I can’t believe this doesn’t cost more!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our guest room, didn’t need anything fancy. This comforter is nicer than some of the more expensive ones I’ve purchased in the past. It’s so soft and surprisingly full. If I could give more than 5 stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: allyson

customer_reviews.title: Honestly, In Love
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing comforter for this price! I'm not sure the proper terminology but throughout the comforter, it is sewn so the inner blanket doesn't get loose. Very high quality! Super easy to clean and dry! Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Mattinson

customer_reviews.title: It was a bit wrinkled at first. Again, it was shipped so I didn’t care. It lays nice once open.
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter! I was worried it would be cheap and made poorly. When it arrived it was vacuum sealed and looked very thin. I opened it and it instantly puffed up. Perfect for winter or summer. I got the striped grey one, it’s very cute and matched with pretty much anything.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Iverson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. Perfect weight and super soft. I bought a white comforter to go underneath to make it more full looking but it wasn't needed. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!! You won't be sorry!!❤️
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this set!!! It's soft, well made and goes perfect with my decor. The pillowcases themselves are awesome too! They are like an envelope. Just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is just okay. I would recommend pairing it with colorful sheets or pillows because it looks super plain on my bed. It's pretty comfortable if you like the cotton feel. Keeps me sort of warm at night.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It is very itchy. I washed it twice to see if it'll soften, but nothing. I also have a king size bed and it barely fits. Even the pillow cases are rough.
customer_reviews.author: Ahli

customer_reviews.title: Short for king size
customer_reviews.text: It’s short for a king on the side keeping it but keeping it anyways with some work smoothing and pulling it works but 🤷🏼‍♀️ just FYI
customer_reviews.author: Jason & K’Lee Terrazas

customer_reviews.title: DON’T PUT IN DRYER
customer_reviews.text: I loved this comforter until I washed it for the first time. I put it in the dryer and when I took it out the blanket has shriveled and was completely messed up. The inner portion is sewn to the outer grey and white striped portion, but this didn’t seem to help. I’m so sad because I loved this comforter and now my queen sized comforter has shriveled to maybe a twin bed size.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a blanket that wasn't a bad texture and something lightweight for the summer months. The only problem I had was washing it, which is on me and not the company. So be careful when washing it.
customer_reviews.author: aidan

customer_reviews.title: weight and simplicity
customer_reviews.text: I love the simplicity of this comforter and the perfect weight. I do not like heavy comforters/bedding - this one is perfect and looks superb. Very classy.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed in this item. Was cheaply made. The cotton stuffing is bunches together and doesn’t fill out the bedding. Would not buy this item again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & Cozy
customer_reviews.text: This bedding is comfortable, soft, cozy and the colors are true to what you see online. The design isn't overwhelming and it's just thick enough to keep you warm but not overheat. Love it, super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Scott

customer_reviews.title: Soft, beautiful in person!!!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast. It’s a simple yet beautiful pattern, just what I was looking for. Comfortable but a little warmer than I expected it to sleep. I have a Cal King and purchased a king (largest size available) and it fits fine, but it’s all about preference. I do not care for much over hang. Just make sure to let comforter sit out a bit when you get in and follow wash/dry instructions. No issues so far!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. A couple of threads not cut off. Needed something for now since my bed arrived earlier than the bedding I wanted, which is still in transit.
customer_reviews.author: Debb D.

customer_reviews.title: The Lord Farquad of king size comforters
customer_reviews.text: It was lightweight, and my girlfriend loved how it looked. But it is VERY small for a king size bed. We had 2-3 inches hanging off on either side when we turned it so the longest side was on the width. But on the plus side, it didn’t collect the hair from our three cats anywhere like what our old comforter did.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: If i could do 0 stars i would, i Washed it and it literally melted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great comforter for the price
customer_reviews.text: So the thing some people complained about is actually what I loved about this comforter. It’s thin but not cheap feeling so it’s light and cool in the hot summer weather. The material is soft and looks well done. I’m really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: is gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE IT BUT THE COMFORTE IS NOT TRUE TO THE SIZE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter/pillowcases set is EXACTLY what I was looking for! I have a king size bed and ordered the king. It fits perfectly! The packaging is deceiving, I thought I ordered the wrong item. But it’s vacuum packed. The comforter is lightweight but warm. The pillowcases are soft and makes for a very comfortable sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great until washing
customer_reviews.text: I liked the packaging and the first few weeks were great but when I washed it it got lumpy and on one side the stitching is coming undone...I was so upset because I had herd so many good things. I wanted it to work so bad but it's just all lumpy now and looks rugged.
customer_reviews.author: Momma approved!

customer_reviews.title: Soft, but full comforter! Fits great on King bed.
customer_reviews.text: We have a King size bed and from some of the reviews I was skeptical about it fitting ours correctly. But, it is a great fit and so soft. It comes vacuum packed for ease of shipping so it was pretty flat when we pulled it out of the packaging but after leaving it open on the bed for the day, it was nice and fluffed up. We have had it for about a month and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: KHubbard414

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTION AT IT'S FINEST
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this comforter! ❤❤ So soft, so comfy, stays cool. The list goes on and on! I feel like I'm sleeping at a hotel with this comforter set! ❤ If you were thinking about getting this, don't hesitate any more. Just add it to your cart or hit buy now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Well made, pretty stripe print, shams required ironing after first wash.
customer_reviews.text: Good product for cost. I am giving it 4 stars because of wrinkle issue. Is NOT wrinkle free. Had to iron shams after washing. All in all, will work for guest room. Very pretty stripe gray print.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Cowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected! Looks great once washed and stretched out. Does needed ironing because it does wrinkle, but great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mother21

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter, nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: This is a great comforter - it's the perfect weight for me (I like a slightly heavier comforter) and it is VERY warm. If you run warm at night (or in the summer time), this may not be ideal for you, but I seriously love this comforter!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Inside bunched up after one wash on gentle cycle! Totally disappointed with this comforter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Overall this product is supersoft and very comfortable. The downfall is that after the first wash, the blue/grey color bled.
customer_reviews.author: JOSHUA A MILLER

customer_reviews.title: Must buy ! Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Was not expecting it to be nice and fluffy. Not too much fluff. I washed it after I opened the package gentle cycle cold water and then dried it on delicate and air fluff took around 3 cycles to get it 85% dry. I ordered a king to fit my Cali king bed and it’s a bit short but it still looks great !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As expected, lots of great style options
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my toddlers room and it was pretty much as expected. I like that they have such stylish options in a comforter, because that’s really hard to find and no one wants a duvet cover for a kids bed, trust me. It can get a little wrinkled after washing but I have bought worse at a more expensive price. I would definitely buy another for my littlest when she moves to a big bed! :)
customer_reviews.author: Megan P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ! Exactly what I imagined. More than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great comforter. It is so soft. The fabric is high quality . The price was great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Mougeot

customer_reviews.title: loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dorm and it was absolutely perfect! Great quality and super light-weight, I never felt too hot or too cold at night. It was super soft as well!
customer_reviews.author: Erika C

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and Modern
customer_reviews.text: My whole family loves the look and feel of this comforter. We purchased some colorful decorative pillows to go with it and it gives our bedroom a cozy and modern vibe.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect thickness
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is the perfect thickness!! Not too thick and stuffy and not too thin and not snuggly. Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.author: Kate Austin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This photo doesn’t do justice to how nice this comforter is! Not too heavy not too light. This is probably the best comforter I’ve ever got..
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this comforter and it was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Mikula

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not worth the money. I wish I could return but nothing is open right now so we are stuck with it. Spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: michelle wojcik

customer_reviews.title: Lovely set!!
customer_reviews.text: I like this comforter set, it is pretty, the comforter is thick enough. I ordered a Queen Size and it fits my bed perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Isol

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Really love this comforter and I’m picky. Noce quality,weight and style.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Rutt

customer_reviews.title: These comforters are exactly what I had in mind!
customer_reviews.text: After ordering one Wake in Cloud comforter I ordered two more for my guest rooms. I like the cotton fabric, the available choices in grey geometric patterns, and that they are just the right weight for year round use. I don't use bed skirts so ordered king size for my queen beds and the size is great even after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Carl R lundgren

customer_reviews.title: L O V E
customer_reviews.text: This comforter set was EXACTLY what I was envisioning. I love cuddling this blanket, it’s not too warm or too cold.. it is literally perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Britney Seward

customer_reviews.title: If you have supersensitive skin don’t buy this product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this when she opened it, the Material it’s pretty soft but it’s not super soft I give us a four out of five star because of its texture but it’s super comfy light weight and nice to sleep with if you don’t have supersensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: JAMES BEYER

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bed set for about a year now and i LOVE it!! it's still in perfect shape and is so so comfy! Would def recommend to anyone interested in this set. Super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Stinnett93

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of 2020
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOOVE this bedding set. It is not itchy at all and high quality. Color/pattern is as described and has the UO aesthetic for a fraction of the price. The pillow cases seem slightly shorter (my standard size pillows poke out of them a tad bit), but it’s something I can easily overlook.
customer_reviews.author: Christine S

product_meta.title: Wake In Cloud - Gray White Striped Comforter Set, Grey White Vertical Ticking Stripes Modern Pattern Printed, 100% Cotton Fabric with Soft Microfiber Inner Fill Bedding (3pcs, Twin Size)
product_meta.description:
Size:Twin

Set Includes
1 x Comforter
2 x Pillow Cases


Size Information
Twin - comforter 68" x 90", pillow cases 20" x 26".
Full - comforter 80" x 90", pillow cases 20" x 26".
Queen - comforter 90" x 90", pillow cases 20" x 26".
King - comforter 104" x 90", pillow cases 20" x 36".
California King - comforter 104" x 98", pillow cases 20" x 36".


Easy Care
Machine wash in cold water, gentle cycle, tumble dry on low or dry naturally, do not bleach.


Guarantee
100% satisfaction with 30 night trial, return for full refund if you don’t entirely love.
feature_bullets: 【Design】Grey and white vertical ticking stripes pattern print. Simple modern gift for teens, boys, girls, men or women.
【Set】1 comforter 68x90 inches (twin size), 2 pillow cases 20x26 inches.
【Material】100% cotton outer fabric with ultra soft microfiber inner fill. Durable, breathable, hypoallergenic, fade-resistant and machine washable.
【Easy Care】Machine wash in cold water, gentle cycle, tumble dry on low or dry naturally, do not bleach.
【Other Products】Please search code in brackets for matching Pillow Cases (B07S7HGWS8), matching Sheets (B07Z8S7LG1).
